item.title: Slayer gone wrong
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

if you are Level 3-50 One/some of your: public int[] lowTask npc id’s are wrong, Look them up in Npc.cfg, or Npclist.txt,
if you are lvl 51-100 one/some of: public int[] mediumTask Npc id’s are Wrong, look them up
if you are level 101+ one/some of your: public int[] highTask npc id’s Are wrong, look them up
I may be wrong but by the look of that picture it says “Non existing Item id” so, it is a non existing item Id…

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer gone wrong
item.dc:creator: @2killsami 2killsami
item.description:
@2killsami wrote:

Hey when i talk to duradel to give metask this what shows:

heres my slayer code

public void giveTask() { if (combatLevel >= 3 && combatLevel <= 50) { taskID = randomLowTask(); taskAmount = 10 + misc.random(40); talk2("Your task is to kill "+taskAmount+" "+GetNpcName(taskID)+"s.", "", 1599); } if (combatLevel >= 51 && combatLevel <= 100) { taskID = randomMediumTask(); taskAmount = 10 + misc.random(40); talk2("Your task is to kill "+taskAmount+" "+GetNpcName(taskID)+"s.", "", 1599); } if (combatLevel >= 101) { taskID = randomHighTask(); taskAmount = 10 + misc.random(40); talk2("Your task is to kill "+taskAmount+" "+GetNpcName(taskID)+"s.", "", 1599); } }

here are the ints:

public int[] lowTask = { 87, 100, 19, 1267, 181, 90, 112, 117, 78, 1153 }; public int[] mediumTask = { 87, 100, 19, 1267, 117, 78, 941, 55, 1338, 2591, 2604, 2610, 1154 }; public int[] highTask = { 1267, 181, 90, 112, 117, 78, 1183, 941, 55, 2591, 2604, 2610, 1154 }; public int taskID = -1; public int taskAmount = -1;

Read full topic
